attributes.action: negotiate with the EU the release of more tickets for the Olympic games to Londoners.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Londoners are paying a substantial amount of money in their Council Tax towards the Olympic games but the EU has stated we will not be given  priority in booking tickets or any discounts.  I feel Londoners should be allocated a certain amount of tickets at a reduced rate and not have to pay the same price as somebody living on the other side of the world.

I hope the Prime Minister can negotiate a fairer deal with the EU for us Londoners.  Please sign my petition if you agree.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
